meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the family Malvaceae.
meanings.sent1: The urena plant has beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a urena in the botanical garden.
meanings.sent3: The urena plant waved in the breeze, looking like a friendly neighbor.
meanings.sent4: The urena plant stood tall in the garden, a symbol of nature's beauty.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the urena plant brightened up the whole garden.

meanings.definition: A tropical plant with hairy leaves and stems.
meanings.sent1: The urena plant's leaves felt soft to the touch.
meanings.sent2: In the rainforest, the urena plant thrived.
meanings.sent3: The hairy urena plant tickled my hand when I touched it.
meanings.sent4: The urena plant's hairy stems danced in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The lush greenery of the urena plant added a tropical touch to the garden.

meanings.definition: A type of weed commonly found in agricultural fields.
meanings.sent1: Farmers work hard to remove urena from their fields.
meanings.sent2: The urena weed spread quickly across the farm.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous urena weed played hide and seek among the crops.
meanings.sent4: The urena weed's persistence reminded me of a stubborn guest.
meanings.sent5: The farmers battled the urena weed to protect their crops from harm.
